pci_app_submit_select_image_tile_custom_: Easily deploy your own application from a custom Docker image
pci_app_submit_select_image_tile_preset_: Explore our catalogue of ready-to-use apps
Easily deploy an application of your choice from our partner models
pci_app_submit_select_image_preset_info: Choose from the following catalogue of applications to speed up the delivery of your services:
pci_app_submit_select_image_preset_price: The price displayed above applies only to the licence for the partner model per resource. Additional fees will apply depending on the type and number of resources and replica nodes you have selected.
pci_app_submit_select_image_preset_condi: I have read and accept the partner terms of use for the deployment of this model.
I have read and accepted the partner terms of use dated {{date}} for the deployment of this model.
pci_app_submit_select_image_tips: Deploy your Docker image by entering its path below. It can come from a public registry (Github, Gitlab, Dockerhub...) or private registry.
pci_app_submit_select_image_info_message: If your Docker image is in a private registry, be sure to add it as an authorised registry beforehand.
Please note that your image must be built with the Docker platform {{architectures}}. Docker-compose cannot be used.
Make sure that the OVHcloud user (42420:42420) has the necessary permissions to launch the image process.
pci_app_submit_select_image_info_custom_: For further information, please refer to our documentation
pci_app_submit_select_image_tips_help: Images hosted on a private or public registry are accepted (GitHub, GitLab, DockerHub, etc.)
pci_app_submit_select_image_portfolio: Explore our portfolio of ready-to-use AI applications
pci_app_submit_select_image_custom_doc: Create your own custom Docker image
pci_app_docker_command_title: Enter the Docker command to launch in the container
pci_app_docker_command_tips: Enter the arguments (separated by spaces) that will be passed to the Docker command. Apostrophes (`) are not supported and should be replaced with quotation marks.
